SEARCH
Package fr.univnantes.document

Class Document

java.lang.Object
fr.univnantes.document.Document
public class Document extends Object
Represents a document

A document is a list of line nodes It contains a name, a UUID and a reference to the first line node It is used to represent a text document

      public Document(String name)
      Create a new document
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the document Must not be null or empty
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the name is null or empty
      IllegalArgumentException - If the name is not valid like specified in isDocumentNameValid(String)

    • insert

      public boolean insert(int line, int column, char character)
      Insert a character at the given position If the position does not exist, it is created If the position already exists, the character is inserted before the existing character
      Parameters:
      line - Coordinate of the line, starts at 0
      column - Coordinate of the column, starts at 0
      character - Character to insert
      Returns:
      True if the character has been inserted, false otherwise

    • modify

    • deleteLineBreak

      public boolean deleteLineBreak(int line)
      Delete a line break between two lines, the selected line is merged with the next line
      Parameters:
      line - Coordinate of the line, starts at 0
      Returns:
      True if the line has been removed, false otherwise

    • insertLineBreak

      public boolean insertLineBreak(int line, int column)
      Insert a line break between two lines, the selected line is split in two The first line contains the characters before the line break The second (new) line contains the characters after the line break
      Parameters:
      line - Coordinate of the line, starts at 0
      column - Coordinate of the column, starts at 0
      Returns:
      True if the line break has been inserted, false otherwise

      public String toString()
      Turns the document into a string Each line is separated by a line break
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The document as a string

    • isDocumentNameValid

      public static boolean isDocumentNameValid(String name)
      Used to check if the document name is valid. Validations are:
      • Not null
      • Not empty
      • Not blank
      • Not longer than 255 characters
      • Does not contains:
        • \
        • /
        • :
        • *
        • ?
        • "
        • <
        • >
        • |
        • \n
        • \t
        • \r
        • \b
        • \f
        • '
        • `
        • Space
      Parameters:
      name - The name to check
      Returns:
      True if the name is valid, false otherwise
